input.description:
This XML document is the event received from the Change management application indicating that a change request has been approved.
Following is a sample structure of the event. <alert-message alert-id="000000000017634"> <server-name>itsm-vm1</server-name> <form-name>CHG:Infrastructure Change</form-name> <object-id>CRQ000000001995</object-id> <source>AR</source> <timestamp>1228721375</timestamp> <priority>0</priority> <text>Compliance Change ID: CRQ000000002152 Status: Scheduled Configuration Name: BLADELOGIC Name:complianceJob JobParentGroup:/jobFolder Host:vm-w23-rds59 RunIndex:2005312 JobType:5106 InconsistentRules:/ruleGroup/ruleName1</text> </alert-message>

output.from: create remediation schedule with bsa approval
output.to: create remediation schedule with bsa approval

input.value: Failed to create remediation job. Recieved following error -

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(., 'NullPointerException')"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">One or more rules for the given compliance job does not have a remediation package associated with it. Cannot remediate target server.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Failed to set COMPLIANCE JOB NAME property for remediation job

call-process.process-name: :BMC_BladeLogic-AD-Operations_Manager:v7.42:Job:Add One Time Schedule with SNMP Notification

input.value: Failed to add schedule for remediation job

input.from: create remediation schedule with bsa approval

input.value: Failed to get tasks for change
Failed to get approval id for change

call-process.process-name: :BMC_BladeLogic-AD-Operations_Manager:v8.0:Job:Add One Time Schedule with SNMP Notification and with Approval

input.value: Failed to add schedule for remediation job

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <status-messages> <xsl:if test="//status-message"> <xsl:copy-of select="//status-message" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="'${success status}'='false'"> <status-message> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${current status message}</xsl:text> </status-message> </xsl:if> </status-messages> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:for-each select="//status-message"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(text(), ' | ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:for-each> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <status-messages> <xsl:copy-of select="//status-message" /> <xsl:if test="'${itsm success status}'='failure'"> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> </xsl:if> </status-messages> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//text()='true' and '${itsm success status}'='success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">success</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <status-messages> <xsl:copy-of select="//status-message" /> <xsl:if test="'${itsm success status}'='failure'"> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> </xsl:if> </status-messages> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//text()='true' and '${itsm success status}'='success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">success</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow is triggered by RBA monitor adapter upon receiving a notification for Change ticket status change. This workflow checks the status of the change ticket for approval. If the change ticket is approved, the workflow creates and executes/schedules remediation package job(s) for the targets that are found to have compliance violations.
